org.webcurator.core.harvester.agent
Class HarvesterHeritrix

java.lang.Object
  org.webcurator.core.harvester.agent.HarvesterHeritrix
All Implemented Interfaces:
Harvester
public class HarvesterHeritrix
extends java.lang.Object
implements Harvester

The HarvesterHeritrix is an implementation of the harvester interface that uses Heritrix as the engine to perform the harvest.

Author:
nwaight
